channel.title: Routers
channel.description:
What are the best in your opinion?
I have D-link DI 524.
The best in my opinion would be...
1. Netgear
or
2. Linksys
So yours is?

item.title: Routers
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

I have a Belkin Wireless Router. It’s very good. I can go on the internet on my laptop, Playstation 2, Desktop and my mums desktop with no problems at all.

Read full topic

I got a netgear and its great…

item.title: Routers
item.dc:creator: @Zach1188 Zach1188
item.description:
@Zach1188 wrote:

[quote=“frank_, post:2, topic:16863”]Debating about what router is best? now really… why?
If it gets its job done its good, else its crap.
I have a modem/router/thing thompson speedtouch or whatever its called.[/quote]
You couldn’t be more wrong. I used to have a Netgear, and it sucked. My connection didn’t always work, but it got the job done, right?

I went and got a linksys router and now my internet has been working perfectly ever since.

Read full topic
